titles.title: Environmental Defense Act of 1996
To require the Secretary of Education to investigate the feasibility of establishing a National Environmental Science and Policy Academy.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Science, and in addition to the Committee on Economic and Educational Opportunities, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to House Economic and Educational Opportunities
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Environment.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Postsecondary Education, Training and Life-Long Learning.

committee.subcommittee: Postsecondary Education, Training and Life-Long Learning
committee.name: House Economic and Educational Opportunities

bill.summary: 9/25/1996--Introduced. Environmental Defense Act of 1996 - Directs the Secretary of Education to investigate, and report to the Congress on, the feasibility of the Federal Government's establishing a National Environmental Science and Policy Academy.
